pages.title: Consumables
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Consumables$() are items that you can right-click to obtain a different item from a predetermined pool of items$(br2)They have varying amounts of rarities and can contain $(#033dfc)Vault Gear$(), $(#033dfc)Relic Pieces$(), $(#033dfc)Vanilla Resources$() and... Kelp?

pages.title: Consumable types
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Relic Booster Packs$(), $(#033dfc)Mystery Boxes$(), $(#033dfc)Runes$(), $(#033dfc)Eggs$() & $(#033dfc)Books$(), $(#033dfc)Pandoras Boxes$() and $(#033dfc)Mod Boxes$() are all considered $(#033dfc)Consumables$() and their Item pools can be viewed in $(#033dfc)JEI$().
